Description: Functions effectively as a consultant to provide optimal ethical and patient centered medical care
Demonstrates proficient and appropriate use of procedural skills both diagnostic and therapeutic
Follows appropriate infection prevention practices and serves as a role model for others
Responds to individual patient health needs and issues as part of patient care
Is up to date on current medical knowledge and applies that knowledge in providing patient care and to promote the learning of others
Is courteous and respectful in interactions including those that are demanding or stressful
Demonstrates honesty and integrity
Is approachable and responsive to concerns raised
Responds to pages and requests in a prompt manner
Communicates respectfully with other allied health professionals
Provides clear explanations in response to patients and families questions
Listens effectively
Accepts feedback graciously
Provides clear understandable instructions
Establishes good relationships with peers and other members of the health care team
Works constructively within the health care team to optimize patient care
Respects the professional knowledge skills and contributions of other allied health professionals
Takes responsibilty for actions without blaming others
Demonstrates strong leadership skills
Effectively manages the team during acute resuscitation of critically ill patients
Conducts daily bedside rounds in an efficient manner while still balancing teaching responsibilities
Makes efficient use of their time to optimize professional performance
overall score
